box2d

Class B2DMuscle

  • java.lang.Object
    • box2d.B2DMuscle

  • public class B2DMuscle
extends java.lang.Object
    A B2DMuscle sits on a B2DJoint and acts as a "rotation" muscle between two B2DBone instances connected to the B2DJoint. It moves the bones by going back and forth between two given angles. Two MutTimer instances determine, when the muscle is which position. The absolute timing is calculated by using the "internal clock" (MutVal cycleLength) of every Creature by the Test

    The B2DMuscle movement itself is regulated and their torque ("strength") is limited; the speed is solely determined by the deviation from the desired angle (hence "regulated"). The B2DMuscle can make up to half a rotation (PI rad). It has a mutation() code implemented changing the timings and the angles.

      Angle between boneA and boneB when timer1 is active.

      Holds the orientation for boneB

      The healthy boolean is true when both B2DBone instances given during initialisation are actually connected to the B2DJoint this instance is referenced to and orientated the correct way.

      Each B2DMuscle can be given an ID.

      Specifies the B2DJoint this B2DMuscle is located in.

      Determines when this B2DMuscle moves to the first angle (angle)
      private mutation.MutTimer timer2

    • Field Detail

      • joint

        private final B2DJoint joint
        Specifies the B2DJoint this B2DMuscle is located in. It can only move two B2DBone instances which are connected (registered) in the B2DJoint.

      • boneA

        private final B2DBone boneA
        First B2DBone this B2DMuscle instance is connected to. The B2DBone must be connected to the B2DJoint joint.

      • boneB

        private final B2DBone boneB
        Second B2DBone this B2DMuscle instance is connected to. The B2DBone must be connected to the B2DJoint joint.

      • boneADir

        private B2DBoneDir boneADir
        Holds the orientation for boneA

      • boneBDir

        private B2DBoneDir boneBDir
        Holds the orientation for boneB

      • timer1

        private final mutation.MutTimer timer1
        Determines when this B2DMuscle moves to the first angle (angle)

      • timer2

        private final mutation.MutTimer timer2
        Determines when this B2DMuscle moves to the second angle (angle + angleOffset)

      • angle

        private final mutation.MutVal angle
        Angle between boneA and boneB when timer1 is active. Angle in rad between 0 and 2 * PI.

      • angleOffset

        private final mutation.MutVal angleOffset
        The angle between boneA and boneB when timer2 is active is angle + angleOffset. angleOffset is in rad and between -PI and PI. This limits the B2DMuscle to only move up to 180°.

      • id

        private final int id
        Each B2DMuscle can be given an ID. This is used for identification.

      • healthy

        private boolean healthy
        The healthy boolean is true when both B2DBone instances given during initialisation are actually connected to the B2DJoint this instance is referenced to and orientated the correct way.

      • maxTorque

        private static float maxTorque
        maxTorque hold the maximum "strength" a B2DMuscle is able to apply to the B2DBones connected to it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • B2DMuscle

        public B2DMuscle(B2DJoint joint_in,
                 B2DBone boneA_in,
                 B2DBone boneB_in,
                 mutation.MutTimer timer1_in,
                 mutation.MutTimer timer2_in,
                 mutation.MutVal angle_in,
                 mutation.MutVal angleOffset_in,
                 int id_in)
        Creates a new B2DMuscle with all parameters given. joint_in references the B2DJoint this instance will connect to. boneA_in and boneB_in reference the two B2DBone instances this B2DMuscle will move. timer1_in and timer2_in are MutTimer instances, angle_in and angleOffset_in are MutVal instances and directly set their corresponding value in this new B2DMuscle.

        Note: Both bones must be connected (referenced) to the B2DJoint joint_in. Calling getHealth() will return false if that's not the case.

        Parameters:
        joint_in - defines the location of the B2DMuscle
        boneA_in - defines the first B2DBone this B2DMuscle can move
        boneB_in - defines the second B2DBone this B2DMuscle can move
        timer1_in - defines the time period the B2DMuscle moves to the first angle
        timer2_in - defines the time period the B2DMuscle moves to the second angle
        angle_in - defines the first angle
        angleOffset_in - defines the difference between the first and the second angle (maximum difference is PI)
        id_in - gives this instance a final ID

      • B2DMuscle

        public B2DMuscle(B2DJoint joint_in,
                 B2DBone boneA_in,
                 B2DBone boneB_in,
                 int id_in)
        Creates a new B2DMuscle instance with new references to B2DJoint and B2DBone instances. joint_in references the B2DJoint this instance will connect to. boneA_in and boneB_in reference the two B2DBone instances this B2DMuscle will move. The other values for the angles and timings are randomly generated.

        Note: Both bones must be connected (referenced) to the B2DJoint joint_in. Calling getHealth() will return false if that's not the case.

        Parameters:
        joint_in - defines the location of the B2DMuscle
        boneA_in - defines the first B2DBone this B2DMuscle can move
        boneB_in - defines the second B2DBone this B2DMuscle can move
        id_in - gives this instance a final ID

    • Method Detail

      • rereferencedMutate

        public B2DMuscle rereferencedMutate(B2DJoint joint_in,
                                    B2DBone boneA_in,
                                    B2DBone boneB_in,
                                    int gen)
        Returns a new B2DMuscle instance with slightly varied values for the contraction times and angles but with new references. joint_in references the B2DJoint the new instance will connect to. boneA_in and boneB_in reference the two B2DBone instances the new B2DMuscle will move. The other values for the angles and timings are slightly changed.

        Note: Both bones must be connected (referenced) to the B2DJoint joint_in. Calling getHealth() of the returned instance will return false if that's not the case.

        Parameters:
        joint_in - is the new B2DJoint of the mutated B2DMuscle
        boneA_in - is the new first B2DBone of the mutated B2DMuscle
        boneB_in - is the new second B2DBone of the mutated B2DMuscle
        gen - current generation of the main Population
        Returns:
        a new mutated B2DMuscle with the new references

      • rereferencedClone

        public B2DMuscle rereferencedClone(B2DJoint joint_in,
                                   B2DBone boneA_in,
                                   B2DBone boneB_in)
        Returns a new B2DMuscle instance with identical values for the contraction times and angles but with new references. joint_in references the B2DJoint the new instance will connect to. boneA_in and boneB_in reference the two B2DBone instances the new B2DMuscle will move. The other values for the angles and timings are directly copied to the new B2DMuscle instance.

        Note: Both bones must be connected (referenced) to the B2DJoint joint_in. Calling getHealth() of the returned instance will return false if that's not the case.

        Parameters:
        joint_in - is the new B2DJoint of the cloned B2DMuscle
        boneA_in - is the new first B2DBone of the cloned B2DMuscle
        boneB_in - is the new second B2DBone of the cloned B2DMuscle
        Returns:
        a cloned B2DMuscle with new references

      • initialiseMuscle

        private void initialiseMuscle()
        This method initialises the values for the B2DBone orientation. Furthermore it checks, if the B2DBone instances are actually connected to the B2DJoint given during initialisation. A negative will result in an error message. This method is called only when creating a new B2DMuscle instance.

      • getHealth

        public boolean getHealth()
        This method returns true only if the B2DMuscle had been initialised correctly. That being that both B2DBone instances given during initialisation are actually connected and registered in the B2DJoint given.

        If it returns false one or both B2DBone instances are not connected to the B2DJoint instance given during initialisation.

        Returns:
        true is setup correctly

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns the int given during initialisation of this B2DMuscle instance.
        Returns:
        ID of the B2DMuscle

      • getJointID

        public int getJointID()
        Returns the ID of the B2DJoint given during initialisation of this B2DMuscle instance.
        Returns:
        ID of the referenced B2DJoint

      • isActivated

        public boolean isActivated(float percentOfCycle)
        Returns whether this B2DMuscle is active at the time given. percentOfCycle is a float between 0.0f and 1.0 and states the modulo of the Creatures cycle length and the time passed. It is calculated by:

        (cycleLength % timePassed)/cycleLength).

        The MutTimer values of this B2DMuscle instance are between 0.0f and 1.0 as well. If percentOfCycle has last surpassed the first timer the method returns true, otherwise it returns false

        Parameters:
        percentOfCycle - "percentage" of the Creatures "inner clock" cycleLength
        Returns:
        whether this B2DMuscle is active at the time given

      • getTorque

        public float getTorque()
        Gives the static maximum torque or "strength" of B2DMuscle
        Returns:
        torque for RevoluteJoint

      • getBones

        public B2DBone[] getBones()
        Gives an B2DBone[2] array with the B2DBone instances this B2DMuscle moves.

        [boneA, boneB]

        Returns:
        references to the B2DBones affected by this B2DMuscle

      • getPos

        public org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 getPos()
        Gives a Vec2 vector of the current position of this B2DMuscle instance. It corresponds to its B2DJoint position.
        Returns:
        the current position vector of the B2DMuscle

      • getBoneDirs

        public B2DBoneDir[] getBoneDirs()
        Gives an B2DBoneDir[2] array with the orientation of the B2DBone instances this B2DMuscle moves.

        [boneDirA, boneDirB]

        Returns:
        orientation of B2DBones referenced in this B2DMuscle instance

      • getOffAngle

        public float getOffAngle()
        Gives the angle (in rad) between boneA and boneB (CCW) when timer1 is active.
        Returns:
        angle when isActive() is true

      • getOnAngle

        public float getOnAngle()
        Gives the angle (in rad) between boneA and boneB (CCW) when timer2 is active.
        Returns:
        angle when isActive() is false
